# codicon-05-back

## Esquema de Bases de Datos

### Users

| id  | name    | phone   | created_at | updated_at |
| --- | ------- | ------- | ---------- | ---------- |
| INT | VARCHAR | VARCHAR | TIMESTAMP  | TIMESTAMP  |

### ONGs

| id  | name    | description | created_at | updated_at |
| --- | ------- | ----------- | ---------- | ---------- |
| INT | VARCHAR | VARCHAR     | TIMESTAMP  | TIMESTAMP  |
